BANNER LANE TRACK RECORD

KEY CLIENTS & ENGAGEMENTS:

RETAINED RPO — Vialite Communications (2022–2024)
RF over Fibre links for Satcom, GPS, Telemetry and Broadcast. Placed BDD USA (direct targeted headhunt at North American competitors like Emcore), RoW BDD (headhunt across European and Middle East satcom/broadcast market), Sales Operations Manager (rebuilt role around high-calibre candidate), APAC BDM. Ongoing 2025 retained work for BDM Spain/Europe and Customer Solutions Engineer. Deep understanding of US, Middle East and European candidate markets.

RETAINED RPO — PPM Power (2022–2024)
Distributor of components/systems for power electronics/high voltage. European Sales Manager search: 150+ candidates, 80+ conversations, shortlist of 3. Secured a Spanish individual now establishing a logistics centre and growing the business. Niche technical sales across Europe.

RETAINED RPO — PPM Systems (2022–2024)
Custom RF design for RF over Fibre systems, antennas, SDRs and RF filtering/conditioning. Multiple placements: Snr Software Engineer (UKEO embedded + application dev), Production Manager (low volume high-complexity, year-long cultural fit search), System Architect (optical/FPGA subsystems, team leadership), Project Manager (software/hardware, bidding, manufacturing), C5ISR Director (headhunted from DE&S customer into industry), Principal Mechanical Design Engineer, NPI Test Dev Engineer (ATE/embedded systems). Also placed BD Director for PPM Ltd (secured someone from major OEM on Force Protection programme), Marketing Manager, Product Manager. Provided salary/benefits survey consulting and IT strategy consulting.

RETAINED — L3Harris ASV (2020–2022)
Autonomous Service Vehicles. Headhunted Technical Director with niche RN/ASV background — subsequently promoted to Managing Director. Placed Operations Director (nationwide headhunt), Programme Manager, BDM (ex-Special Boat Service network).

PSL — L3Harris TRL (2022–2024)
Military Comms and Cryptography. Placed Firmware Engineer, Principal Embedded Software Engineer, Software Engineer, DSP Engineer. Success led to PSL serving whole of L3Harris internationally.

RETAINED — Jankel Armouring (2020–2023)
Armoured Vehicles and Seating. Placed Head of Supply Chain (new function), Operations Director (secured MD of major competitor — later promoted to MD of Jankel), Production Manager.

CONTINGENT — NP Aerospace (2021)
Introduced ex-RBSL MD Peter Hardisty to CEO. Promoted to Vice President Armour Systems, added significantly to business success.

RETAINED — MSI Defence Systems (2022–2023)
Weapon Systems. Placed Control Systems Engineer and Electrical Engineer for new product range development. Secured relocators to Norwich.

RETAINED — Seebyte (2022)
UUV software. Headhunted Capability Development Manager from Navy Mine Warfare. Utilised contacts to access serving 'invisible' network. Secured a WO1 who made very positive business impact.

RETAINED — CRFS (2024)
RF Systems for Spectrum Monitoring. Snr RF Engineer search — RF and Embedded C for radio product design/debug. Nationwide search securing relocators.

RETAINED — MTU Maintenance (2025)
Aeroengine refurbishment. VP Engineering & Materials Management (Germany/Austria-wide search, Part 145 experience, large engineering teams). VP Quality (Berlin relocator, Part 145 quality, operational leadership, transformation, regulator expertise).

RETAINED — Trelleborg (2024–2025)
Aero and interior aerospace seals. Finance Manager Europe (multi-plant, Africa industrialisation), Financial Controller Lindau (growing factory, southern Germany), Financial Controller Morocco (plant establishment), General Manager Pittsburgh (100-person $20M business through acquisition), General Manager Seattle (60-person $10M business through acquisition).

BAE Systems via PPM (2026)
12-month renewed contract covering full range of RF electronics candidates from Managing Director to Test Engineer.

PSL — Drumgrange (2023): Military Comms/Navigation — Software, Electronics, Firmware Engineers (UKEO, DSP, Sonar, Comms)
PSL — Enterprise Control Systems (2023): Datalinks/EW — Embedded Systems Engineers, Mechanical Design Engineer
PSL — Gooch & Housego (2023–2024): Optical subsystems for sighting/targeting — Senior Mechanical Design Engineer (relocator), Global Security Manager (US ITAR/DoD, nationwide campaign, relocator)

CORE STRENGTHS:
• UK defence sector specialist — deep network across mid-tier primes and SMEs
• Retained search methodology with proven executive-level placements
• Headhunting from direct competitors and 'invisible' networks (serving military, cleared personnel)
• UKEO/security-cleared talent pipeline
• Cross-border search capability: UK, Europe (Germany, Spain, Nordics), US, Middle East
• Track record of candidates being promoted post-placement (TD→MD at L3Harris ASV, OD→MD at Jankel, VP at NP Aerospace)
• Technical understanding across RF, electronics, embedded software, optical systems, armoured vehicles, UUVs, UAVs, comms, EW
• Salary benchmarking and strategic consulting for defence SMEs
• Typical engagement: retained RPO or PSL, focused on hard-to-find UKEO/cleared engineers and leadership
